attributes.action: Remove support from George Bush's administration and refuse to support the war on terror
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is being treated as a lacky because of Tony Blair's refusal to stand up for himself and his country. We need to take a stand otherwise we will end up following America into war against Iran as well. The Americans are steadily trying to increase pressure on Iran which will finally culminate in war.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
